name: ハローキティとせかいりょこう！ いろんなくにへ おでかけしましょ！
synopsis: Around The World With Hello Kitty & Friends lets you travel the globe with the much-loved Hello Kitty, making new friends and having lots of fun along the way! Head to 15 different countries – play minigames in Japan, France, Brazil, Kenya, the UK and the USA, then go shopping for over 270 themed outfits and dress up Hello Kitty however you please! Lots of friends are waiting to have fun with you! Help Cinnamoroll organise a fashion show, go to a Japanese festival with Usahana, run a restaurant with My Melody and much more! You can also use Hello Kitty’s savings to pick up all kinds of gifts from all over the world, including photos of famous places, and then take your own photos with Hello Kitty herself using the AR Card that comes packaged with the game. Pose with her and have fun!
